divs: sighting detailspersonal information shared in this sighting report ok to share with the public. last wednesday, 6-23-10, i was skywatching and i had a pretty significant sighting and i shared it with [cms\tg\pid] and [cms\tg\pid]. at first i thought i was watching the iss fly over, but several things convinced me that what i was seeing was not the iss........ there were many times in years past that i took my youngest son out to watch the iss\shuttle connected and flying overhead. i know very well from these past times how bright they were, how fast they flew over, etc........ the iss did fly over my area this night and its track was sw to ene........the degree coming and going were both 17 degrees above the horizon with a max elevation of 61 degrees. the duration was for 4 minutes for the iss. the sighting duration time began at 9:45 pm........ the object i saw flew sw to ne........about 35 degrees coming and about 60 degrees going.......the max elevation was 80 degrees......damn near straight over my head........from my vantage point on my drive way there would be no way for me to see the iss at 17 degrees either coming or going.......and remember my home is located on a hill overlooking a valley and the max elevation of my object was 19 degrees higher than what the iss was flying......... i first spotted the object at a long distance in the sw at about 35 degrees, between the moon and the top of trees from my vantage point. it brightness was brighter than the moon, no clouds in the sky......its size was about two times brighter than jupiter at it biggest in the winter sky.......... the object stayed the exact same brightness and size during the entire sighting time.......between 1 to 1 1\2 minutes...........unlike sat\'s. or iss\shuttle, there was no gradual buildup to full brightness and then a gradual ease to disappearance........my 1 to 1\2 minute sighting time was in direct contradiction to the 4 minute fly by duration time of the iss.....9:45 pm to 9:49 pm.....my sighting time was 9:48\49 pm to 9:51 pm........the shorter time span of my sighting meant that what i saw was traveling much faster than the iss, and began near the end of the iss sighting time duration, which would have meant that when i first saw my object far in the sw sky, the iss would have already been nearly out of view in the ene sky........ i had my binoculars with me and watched the object the entire time through them except for about 5 seconds as i raised the binoculars up to my eyes. i had already earlier in the night set my focus\vision....... these binoculars have a button to press and hold down for image stabilization (cannon 10 x 30) similar to a video camera. the is on this set of binoculars stills the image so there is no blurring or shaking effect when looking at an object at distance, and maintains the still effect as an object moves in real time as long as the is button is pressed down..... when i pressed the is button and held it down i could very clearly see that the object was not just a bright, white light in the sky, but was a structured object different than the iss. the bottom part of the object was elongated like a hot dog or hot dog bun, and had a rounded, dome structure on top, dead center. i could see the outline of this object during the entire sighting time. from my perspective the object had a typical saucer shape to it. note: every single time in the past while taking my so to watch iss\shuttle fly overs, nasa tracking times over areas were perfect.......if nasa said say 7:22 pm, then my cell phone which uses sat. time said 7:22 pm when we first spotted the fly overs. last year i reported that the ufo\'s were mimicking stars, planets, iss, shuttle on fly overs in my area. linda moulton howe reported this same thing on coast to coast am in 2009. these objects\crafts have been flying over this area on a regular basis for nearly two years now. i believe that the object i witnessed was doing the same, and trailing\following the iss along its same flight path as to not raise any suspicions. [cms\tg\pid]
Summary: Extrememly bright, white light when seen through IS binoculars had structure.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Franklin
There were no other sightings in Franklin on or around June 23rd 2010
